Style/TrivialAccessors.description:
Description

Prefer attr_* methods to trivial readers/writers.
Style/TrivialAccessors.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

ExactNameMatch: True (type: bool)
AllowPredicates: True (type: bool)
AllowDSLWriters: True (type: bool)
IgnoreClassMethods: False (type: bool)
AllowedMethods: ['to_ary', 'to_a', 'to_c', 'to_enum', 'to_h', 'to_hash', 'to_i', 'to_int', 'to_io', 'to_open', 'to_path', 'to_proc', 'to_r', 'to_regexp', 'to_str', 'to_s', 'to_sym'] (type: list)
